comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly George Pomeroy Goodale, "for nearly fifty-four years dramatic editor of The Detroit Free Press" NYT of May 8,1919 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60712FE3D5E157A9... announces his death and mentions a celebration of fifty years as a critic with the Detroit Free Press in October 1915. Bio at www.angelfire.com/mi2/goodale/gpgoodalebio.html

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We will update our record.
